argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmapidcl.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pmapidcl.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 3 |  | pmapidcl.c | |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Atoms ` K ) = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 5 | 4, 3 | #P_psubclssatN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. C ) -> X C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( _|_P ` K ) = ( _|_P ` K ) |
| 7 | 1, 4, 2, 6 | #P_2polvalN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) -> ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` X ) ) = ( M ` ( U ` X ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. C ) -> ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` X ) ) = ( M ` ( U ` X ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 3 | #P_psubcli2N | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. C ) -> ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` X ) ) = X ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. C ) -> ( M ` ( U ` X ) ) = X ) |
